actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 101-892.
Referred to Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts and Administrative Practice

official_title: A bill to make a technical amendment to tile 11, United States Code, the Bankruptcy Code.
short_title: Railroad Reorganization Public Interest Protection Act

summary.text: Railroad Reorganization Public Interest Protection Act - Amends the Federal bankruptcy code to mandate that in any railroad reorganization scheme (except with respect to rolling stock equipment) the public interest in continued rail service must be considered by the court and the trustee in addition to the interests of debtors, creditors, and equity security holders.

titles.title: Railroad Reorganization Public Interest Protection Act
A bill to make a technical amendment to tile 11, United States Code, the Bankruptcy Code.
